Function reference

Pre fitting

Helper functions for preparing a seed population and control tables from ABS databases.

read_census_microdata() csf_id_cols
Read ABS Census of Population and Housing Microdata into a tidy format
read_census_tablebuilder()
Read Census TableBuilder generated csv files
load_abs_shp()
Load ABS Shapefile
create_fitting_control()
Create a control table.
create_fitting_sample()
Create a reference sample
prefit_control_retotal()
Retotal a control table using a new grand total.
prefit_csf_agep_to_age5p()
Recategorise Census Sample File's Age of Person to five-year age group
csf_geo2016() csf_geo2011()
Create a census Samlple File's zone table

Data dictionary

census_2011_dictionary
ABS census 2011 data dictionary
census_2016_dictionary
ABS census 2016 data dictionary
vista1218web
A merged between the persons table and the households table of VISTA 2012-2018, a public version.

Recode

Functions for recoding Census Sample File variables to VISTA.

recode_cvista_age()
Create CVISTA age
recode_cvista_age5()
Create CVISTA five-year age group (derived variable)
recode_cvista_anzsco1()
Create CVISTA occupation field
recode_cvista_anzsic1()
Create CVISTA industry of work field
recode_cvista_cars()
Create CVISTA cars (partial match)
recode_cvista_dwelltype()
Create CVISTA dwelltype
recode_cvista_emptype()
Create CVISTA employment type
recode_cvista_hhinc()
Create CVISTA hhinc (derived variable)
recode_cvista_hhtype()
Create CVISTA household type (hhtype_c)
recode_cvista_owndwell()
Create CVISTA owndwell (partial match)
recode_cvista_relationship()
Create CVISTA relationship (partial match)
recode_cvista_sex()
Create CVISTA sex
recode_cvista_studying()
Create CVISTA studying
make_recode_cvista()
A factory function to create recode_cvista_*()

Post fitting

Functions for post fitting.

postfit_add_relationships()
Add relationship fields to a Census synthetic population
postfit_integerise_age5p()
Turn 5 year age group into a singly year
morph_cvista()
Morph VISTA-population

Workflow

run_workflow()
Run the ATRC workflow

On this page
